nodes.bodyText: Can we also update the descrption for getCharacterSet()?
Can we remove all formatting changes in this class and keep only the new additions?
some of the formatting might be caused by android studio, I checked the file out from develop and reapplied my changes and some of the formatting changes are still present

adding  @since SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0 to the old values is confusing because it can be understood that it got added in version 7. Can we update the javadoc to make it more clear that it got deprecated in 7? there should be a more standard way of doing that. if not we can simply remove it.
updated to use @deprecated in SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0 instead
